text: Arnim may refer to: ==People== * Bettina von Arnim (1785-1859), born Elisabeth Catharina Ludovica Magdalena Brentano, German writer and novelist * Ludwig Achim von Arnim (1781–1831), German poet and novelist * Arnim (surname) ==Other uses== * Arnim Zola, a fictional character in the Marvel Comics universe * 8055 Arnim
title: Arnim
